articles.title: Dark Chocolate Compound Linked To Slower Aging - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A compound naturally found in dark chocolate may slow key signs of aging in the body.
articles.content: A compound naturally found in dark chocolate may slow key signs of aging in the body. Researchers discovered that people with higher levels of theobromine often look biologically younger on a molecul… [+4624 chars]

articles.title: Adobe brings Photoshop, Express and Acrobat features to ChatGPT - TechCrunch
articles.description: ChatGPT's 800 million plus userbase can now use Adobe's apps to modify images and PDFs
articles.content: Adobe is doubling down on its strategy of using AI to bring more users into its product ecosystem. The company on Wednesday said it is adding features from Photoshop, Express and Acrobat to ChatGPT, … [+1972 chars]
